data.text: @AnthonyDaleOHA As should each citizen. Follow personal best practice going forward.
@AnthonyDaleOHA Historically, demonstraring immunity was not related to vaccination statues, but rather to titer levels. Why is COVID being treated differently?
@FaveMuneca @AnthonyDaleOHA Got some news for you. Business won’t and people will not boycott. You can if you want, but most will not.
@AnthonyDaleOHA I'm not vaccinated, but not at risk because I've already had Covid. What now?
@AnthonyDaleOHA @WRHospital So what’s good enough for our government of Ontario isn’t good enough for the decrepit WRH?
@AnthonyDaleOHA Good. I think all businesses should do this. And that we should indefinitely boycott all the ones that don't

@AnthonyDaleOHA I certainly hope you are correct. Immunosuppressed people should not have to put themselves at great risk to receive medical care. For some more severely immunosuppressed ppl, becoming infected with COVID may result in death.

@AnthonyDaleOHA Immunocomprimised is not choice being unvaxxed is. Don’t lump them together. Also there are so few unvaxxed that it no longer matters. The fact the vaccines are not even a functional prophylactic is the bigger issue. COVID is here forever wake up
@AnthonyDaleOHA How do we see the number of outstanding delayed surgeries by  hospital in Ontario?
